overview: Welcome to our interactive map tracking COVID-19 cases across Canada in real-time. To see how your region is doing, zoom in or let Flatten access your current location.
privacy_disclaimer: In order to mitigate trolling we use cookies and recaptcha, and we track suspicious IP addresses.
results_disclaimer: Results are based on preliminary models and evolving data and should not be considered final. As testing and development continues, our findings should be interpreted with caution. This map identifies the status of individuals reporting on FLATTEN.ORG in a given region and does not determine safe or at-risk areas.
